text: And assuredly read wa-in or wa-inna to each that is to all creatures verily la-mā the mā is extra and the lām is in the place of an implied oath or a separator; a variant reading has lammā with the sense of illā ‘but’ making the preceding in for negation your Lord will pay for his works that is the requital thereof in full. Truly He is Aware of what they do knowing the inner and outer aspects thereof.
